title: Remove newsletter signup and statistics sections

requirements.text: Remove the newsletter signup bar displaying 'Join our newsletter for energy insights and exclusive offers' from the landing page

quotes: Join our newsletter for energy insights and exclusive offers

acceptanceCriteria: The newsletter signup bar with gradient styling is completely removed from the page
No newsletter-related UI elements remain visible

requirements.text: Remove the statistics section displaying '10K+ Installations Worldwide', '99.9% System Uptime', and '50M+ kWh Generated' from the CallToActionSection component
acceptanceCriteria: The three statistics cards (installations, uptime, kWh) are completely removed
No placeholder statistics remain in the call-to-action area
The CallToActionSection layout adjusts appropriately after removing the statistics

constraints: Do not modify the main CTA functionality or email signup form in CallToActionSection
Preserve all other sections of the landing page
nonGoals: Adding replacement content for the removed sections
Modifying any other statistics or metrics elsewhere on the page
